ValidationRule.description: Number of Groups is required if Cohort Type is Group to move the status from define to design.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Individual_Coaching', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Group_Coaching' ) , ISCHANGED(Product_Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Product_Request_Status__c),'Define'), ISPICKVAL(Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design'), ISPICKVAL(Cohort_Type__c,'Group'), ISBLANK(Number_Of_Groups__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Number of Groups” is required to update the Product Request Status.
